input:
---
auth_map_additions: []

alb_settings: {}

# controls the managed node group, not the # of karpenter nodes
managed_node_group:
  instance_types:
    - t3a.medium
  desired_size: 2
  min_size: 2
  max_size: 8

region: "us-west-2"
root_domain: "nuon.cloud"
vantage:
  agent:
    clusterID: ""

# the default karpenter EC2NodeClass is created by default
# any additional EC2NodeClasses should be created here
ec2nodeclasses: []

additional_nodepools: []

karpenter:
  instance_types:
    - t3a.medium

---
tier: beta
auth_map_additions:
  - name: eks-workers-executors
    account: stage
    groups:
      - "system:masters"
    trust:
      - "arn:aws:iam::766121324316:role/nuon-internal-support-stage"

managed_node_group:
  min_size: 2
  max_size: 10
  desired_size: 2
  instance_types:
    - t3a.medium

ec2nodeclasses:
 - clickhouse-installation
 - clickhouse-keeper
 - ctl-api-api
 - ctl-api-worker
 - public
 - temporal

additional_nodepools:
  - name: public
    instance_types:
      - t3a.xlarge
    limits:
      cpu: 250
      memory: "500Gi"
    expireAfter: "24h"
    disruption:
      consolidationPolicy: "WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized"
      consolidateAfter: "1m"
      # NOTE(fd): perform disruptions during off hours
      # in this case, between 3AM EST/8AM UTC 7AM EST/12PM UTC
      # we start the node=0 budget at 3AM and it lasts for 20 hours
      budgets:
        - nodes: "1" # allow empty nodes to be consolidated
          reasons:
          - "Empty"
          - "Drifted"
        - nodes: "1"
          schedule: "0 8 * * 1,2,3,4,5" # https://crontab.guru/#0_8_*_*_1,2,3,4,5
          duration: "20h"
          reasons:
          - "Underutilized"
  - name: public-otel
    instance_types:
      - t3a.xlarge
    limits:
      cpu: 50
      memory: "100Gi"
    expireAfter: "24h"
    disruption:
      consolidationPolicy: "WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized"
      consolidateAfter: "1m"
      # NOTE(fd): perform disruptions during off hours
      # in this case, between 3AM EST/8AM UTC 7AM EST/12PM UTC
      # we start the node=0 budget at 3AM and it lasts for 20 hours
      budgets:
        - nodes: "1" # allow empty nodes to be consolidated
          reasons:
          - "Empty"
          - "Drifted"
        - nodes: "1"
          schedule: "0 7 * * 1,2,3,4,5" # https://crontab.guru/#0_8_*_*_1,2,3,4,5
          duration: "20h"
          reasons:
          - "Underutilized"
  - name: temporal
    instance_types:
      - t3a.large
    limits:
      cpu: 50
      memory: "100Gi"
    expireAfter: "2160h"
    disruption:
      consolidationPolicy: "WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized"
      consolidateAfter: "1m"
      # NOTE(fd): perform disruptions during off hours
      # in this case, between 3AM EST/8AM UTC 7AM EST/12PM UTC
      # we start the node=0 budget at 3AM and it lasts for 20 hours
      budgets:
        - nodes: "1"
          schedule: "0 10 * * 1,2,3,4,5" # https://crontab.guru/#0_8_*_*_1,2,3,4,5
          duration: "23h"
          reasons:
          - "Underutilized"
        - nodes: "1" # allow empty nodes to be consolidated
          reasons:
          - "Empty"
          - "Drifted"

  - name: clickhouse-keeper
    instance_types:
      - t3a.medium
    labels:
      clickhouse-keeper: "true"
    limits:
      cpu: 8
      memory: "32Gi"
    expireAfter: "2160h"
    disruption:
      budgets:
        - nodes: "0"
      consolidationPolicy: "WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized"
      consolidateAfter: "15m"
    taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: installation
        value: clickhouse-keeper
    zones:
      - us-west-2a
      - us-west-2b
        
  - name: clickhouse-installation
    instance_types:
      - t3a.large
    labels:
      clickhouse-installation: "true"
    limits:
      cpu: 14
      memory: "1000Gi"
    expireAfter: "2160h"
    disruption:
      budgets:
        - nodes: "0"
      consolidationPolicy: "WhenEmpty"
      consolidateAfter: "15m"
    taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: installation
        value: clickhouse-installation
    zones:
      - us-west-2a
      - us-west-2b

  - name: ctl-api-worker
    instance_types:
      - t3a.xlarge
    labels:
      ctl-api-worker: "true"
    limits:
      cpu: 1000
      memory: "500Gi"
    expireAfter: "48h"
    disruption:
      budgets:
        - nodes: "1"
          reasons:
          - "Empty"
          - "Drifted"
      consolidationPolicy: "WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized"
      consolidateAfter: "30s"
    taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: deployment
        value: ctl-api-worker
    zones:
      - us-west-2a
      - us-west-2d

  - name: workers-executors
    nodeclass: default
    instance_types:
      - t3a.medium
    labels:
      workers-executors: "true"
    taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: deployment
        value: workers-executors
    limits:
      cpu: 1k
      memory: 200Gi
    expireAfter: 64013s
    disruption:
      budgets:
        - nodes: 10%
      consolidationPolicy: "WhenEmpty"
      consolidateAfter: 30s
    zones:
      - us-west-2b

                  
karpenter:
  instance_types:
    - t3a.medium
    - t3a.large
values.output:
additional_nodepools:
    - disruption:
        budgets:
            - nodes: "1"
              reasons:
                - Empty
                - Drifted
            - duration: 20h
              nodes: "1"
              reasons:
                - Underutilized
              schedule: 0 8 * * 1,2,3,4,5
        consolidateAfter: 1m
        consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
      expireAfter: 24h
      instance_types:
        - t3a.xlarge
      limits:
        cpu: 250
        memory: 500Gi
      name: public
    - disruption:
        budgets:
            - nodes: "1"
              reasons:
                - Empty
                - Drifted
            - duration: 20h
              nodes: "1"
              reasons:
                - Underutilized
              schedule: 0 7 * * 1,2,3,4,5
        consolidateAfter: 1m
        consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
      expireAfter: 24h
      instance_types:
        - t3a.xlarge
      limits:
        cpu: 50
        memory: 100Gi
      name: public-otel
    - disruption:
        budgets:
            - duration: 23h
              nodes: "1"
              reasons:
                - Underutilized
              schedule: 0 10 * * 1,2,3,4,5
            - nodes: "1"
              reasons:
                - Empty
                - Drifted
        consolidateAfter: 1m
        consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
      expireAfter: 2160h
      instance_types:
        - t3a.large
      limits:
        cpu: 50
        memory: 100Gi
      name: temporal
    - disruption:
        budgets:
            - nodes: "0"
        consolidateAfter: 15m
        consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
      expireAfter: 2160h
      instance_types:
        - t3a.medium
      labels:
        clickhouse-keeper: "true"
      limits:
        cpu: 8
        memory: 32Gi
      name: clickhouse-keeper
      taints:
        - effect: NoSchedule
          key: installation
          value: clickhouse-keeper
      zones:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2b
    - disruption:
        budgets:
            - nodes: "0"
        consolidateAfter: 15m
        consolidationPolicy: WhenEmpty
      expireAfter: 2160h
      instance_types:
        - t3a.large
      labels:
        clickhouse-installation: "true"
      limits:
        cpu: 14
        memory: 1000Gi
      name: clickhouse-installation
      taints:
        - effect: NoSchedule
          key: installation
          value: clickhouse-installation
      zones:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2b
    - disruption:
        budgets:
            - nodes: "1"
              reasons:
                - Empty
                - Drifted
        consolidateAfter: 30s
        consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
      expireAfter: 48h
      instance_types:
        - t3a.xlarge
      labels:
        ctl-api-worker: "true"
      limits:
        cpu: 1000
        memory: 500Gi
      name: ctl-api-worker
      taints:
        - effect: NoSchedule
          key: deployment
          value: ctl-api-worker
      zones:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2d
    - disruption:
        budgets:
            - nodes: 10%
        consolidateAfter: 30s
        consolidationPolicy: WhenEmpty
      expireAfter: 64013s
      instance_types:
        - t3a.medium
      labels:
        workers-executors: "true"
      limits:
        cpu: 1k
        memory: 200Gi
      name: workers-executors
      nodeclass: default
      taints:
        - effect: NoSchedule
          key: deployment
          value: workers-executors
      zones:
        - us-west-2b
alb_settings: {}
auth_map_additions:
    - account: stage
      groups:
        - system:masters
      name: eks-workers-executors
      trust:
        - arn:aws:iam::766121324316:role/nuon-internal-support-stage
ec2nodeclasses:
    - clickhouse-installation
    - clickhouse-keeper
    - ctl-api-api
    - ctl-api-worker
    - public
    - temporal
karpenter:
    instance_types:
        - t3a.medium
        - t3a.large
managed_node_group:
    desired_size: 2
    instance_types:
        - t3a.medium
    max_size: 10
    min_size: 2
region: us-west-2
root_domain: nuon.cloud
tier: beta
vantage:
    agent:
        clusterID: ""

metadata.name: cert-manager
metadata.notes:
cert-manager v1.11.0 has been deployed successfully!

In order to begin issuing certificates, you will need to set up a ClusterIssuer
or Issuer resource (for example, by creating a 'letsencrypt-staging' issuer).

More information on the different types of issuers and how to configure them
can be found in our documentation:

https://cert-manager.io/docs/configuration/

For information on how to configure cert-manager to automatically provision
Certificates for Ingress resources, take a look at the `ingress-shim`
documentation:

https://cert-manager.io/docs/usage/ingress/

metadata.name: ebs-csi-controller
metadata.notes:
To verify that aws-ebs-csi-driver has started, run:

    kubectl get pod -n ebs-csi-controller -l "app.kubernetes.io/name=aws-ebs-csi-driver,app.kubernetes.io/instance=ebs-csi-controller"

NOTE: The [CSI Snapshotter](https://github.com/kubernetes-csi/external-snapshotter) controller and CRDs will no longer be installed as part of this chart and moving forward will be a prerequisite of using the snap shotting functionality.

values.name: external-dns
values:
---
interval: 15m
triggerLoopOnEvent: true

policy: sync

registry: txt

provider: aws

metadata.name: reflector
metadata.notes: Reflector can now be used to perform automatic copy actions on secrets and configmaps.

values.name: internal-issuer
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
kind: ClusterIssuer
metadata:
  name: internal-issuer
  namespace: cert-manager
spec:
  acme:
    email: dns@nuon.co
    privateKeySecretRef:
      name: internal-issuer
    server: https://acme-v02.api.letsencrypt.org/directory
    solvers:
    - dns01:
        route53:
          hostedZoneID: Z07320593P6BV5OTYGDKW
          region: us-west-2
      selector:
        dnsZones:
        - nuon.us-west-2.stage.internal.nuon.co

values.name: public-issuer
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
kind: ClusterIssuer
metadata:
  name: public-issuer
  namespace: cert-manager
spec:
  acme:
    email: dns@nuon.co
    privateKeySecretRef:
      name: public-issuer
    server: https://acme-v02.api.letsencrypt.org/directory
    solvers:
    - dns01:
        route53:
          hostedZoneID: Z0145818PA7XYIVRHAK0
          region: us-west-2
      selector:
        dnsZones:
        - stage.nuon.co

values.name: wildcard
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
kind: Certificate
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: infra-eks
    app.kubernetes.io/name: wildcard
  name: wildcard
  namespace: default
spec:
  dnsNames:
  - '*.stage.nuon.co'
  - stage.nuon.co
  issuerRef:
    kind: ClusterIssuer
    name: public-issuer
  secretName: wildcard-tls
  secretTemplate:
    annotations:
      reflector.v1.k8s.emberstack.com/reflection-allowed: "true"
      reflector.v1.k8s.emberstack.com/reflection-allowed-namespaces: ""

values.description: Provides permissions for AWS Load Balancer Controller addon
values.name: AmazonEKS_AWS_Load_Balancer_Controller-20241031073800913800000006

values.description: Cert Manager policy to allow management of Route53 hosted zone records
values.name: AmazonEKS_Cert_Manager_Policy-2024103107391053600000000d

values.description: Provides permissions to manage EBS volumes via the container storage interface driver
values.name: AmazonEKS_EBS_CSI_Policy-20241031073800735500000005

certificates.issuer: OU=Starfield Class 2 Certification Authority,O=Starfield Technologies\, Inc.,C=US
certificates.subject: CN=Starfield Services Root Certificate Authority - G2,O=Starfield Technologies\, Inc.,L=Scottsdale,ST=Arizona,C=US

certificates.issuer: CN=Starfield Services Root Certificate Authority - G2,O=Starfield Technologies\, Inc.,L=Scottsdale,ST=Arizona,C=US
certificates.subject: CN=Amazon Root CA 1,O=Amazon,C=US

values.description: Cluster encryption policy to allow cluster role to utilize CMK provided
values.name: stage-nuon-cluster-ClusterEncryption20241031073804242600000008

ingress.description: Node to node ingress on ephemeral ports

values.description: Node to node ingress on ephemeral ports
EKS managed node group IAM role
values.name: karpenter-eks-node-group-20241031073759069800000001

values.description: Custom launch template for karpenter EKS managed node group
values.name: karpenter-2024103107492940700000000c

values.description: External DNS policy to allow management of Route53 hosted zone records
values.name: AmazonEKS_External_DNS_Policy-2024103107391053690000000e
clickhouse-installation
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: karpenter.sh/v1
kind: NodePool
metadata:
  labels:
    clickhouse-installation: "true"
  name: clickhouse-installation
spec:
  disruption:
    budgets:
    - nodes: "0"
    consolidateAfter: 15m
    consolidationPolicy: WhenEmpty
  limits:
    cpu: 14
    memory: 1000Gi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        clickhouse-installation: "true"
    spec:
      expireAfter: 2160h
      nodeClassRef:
        group: karpenter.k8s.aws
        kind: EC2NodeClass
        name: clickhouse-installation
      requirements:
      - key: karpenter.sh/capacity-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - on-demand
      - key: node.kubernetes.io/instance-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - t3a.large
      - key: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        operator: In
        values:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2b
      taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: installation
        value: clickhouse-installation

values.name: clickhouse-keeper
values.yaml_body_parsed:

  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        clickhouse-keeper: "true"
    spec:
      expireAfter: 2160h
      nodeClassRef:
        group: karpenter.k8s.aws
        kind: EC2NodeClass
        name: clickhouse-keeper
      requirements:
      - key: karpenter.sh/capacity-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - on-demand
      - key: node.kubernetes.io/instance-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - t3a.medium
      - key: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        operator: In
        values:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2b
      taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: installation
        value: clickhouse-keeper

values.name: ctl-api-worker
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: karpenter.sh/v1
kind: NodePool
metadata:
  labels:
    ctl-api-worker: "true"
  name: ctl-api-worker
spec:
  disruption:
    budgets:
    - nodes: "1"
      reasons:
      - Empty
      - Drifted
    consolidateAfter: 30s
    consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
  limits:
    cpu: 1000
    memory: 500Gi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        ctl-api-worker: "true"
    spec:
      expireAfter: 48h
      nodeClassRef:
        group: karpenter.k8s.aws
        kind: EC2NodeClass
        name: ctl-api-worker
      requirements:
      - key: karpenter.sh/capacity-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - on-demand
      - key: node.kubernetes.io/instance-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - t3a.xlarge
      - key: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        operator: In
        values:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2d
      taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: deployment
        value: ctl-api-worker

values.name: public
values.yaml_body_parsed:

kind: NodePool

    pool.nuon.co: public

  disruption:
    budgets:
    - nodes: "1"
      reasons:
      - Empty
      - Drifted
    - duration: 20h
      nodes: "1"
      reasons:
      - Underutilized
      schedule: 0 8 * * 1,2,3,4,5
    consolidateAfter: 1m
    consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
  limits:
    cpu: 250
    memory: 500Gi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pool.nuon.co: public
    spec:
      expireAfter: 24h
      nodeClassRef:
        group: karpenter.k8s.aws
        kind: EC2NodeClass
        name: public
      requirements:
      - key: karpenter.sh/capacity-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - on-demand
      - key: node.kubernetes.io/instance-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - t3a.xlarge
      - key: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        operator: In
        values:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2b
        - us-west-2c
      taints:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: pool.nuon.co
        value: public

values.name: workers-executors

spec:

    budgets:

  limits:
    cpu: 1k
    memory: 200Gi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:

      expireAfter: 64013s

        group: karpenter.k8s.aws
        kind: EC2NodeClass
        name: default
      requirements:
      - key: karpenter.sh/capacity-type
        operator: In

      - key: node.kubernetes.io/instance-type
        operator: In
        values:

        value: workers-executors

values.name: clickhouse-installation
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: karpenter.k8s.aws/v1
kind: EC2NodeClass
metadata:
  name: clickhouse-installation
spec:
  amiSelectorTerms:
  - alias: al2@latest
  instanceProfile: KarpenterNodeInstanceProfileV2-stage-nuon
  securityGroupSelectorTerms:
  - tags:
      karpenter.sh/discovery: stage-nuon
  subnetSelectorTerms:
  - tags:
      karpenter.sh/discovery: stage-nuon
  tags:
    karpenter.sh/discovery: stage-nuon

values.name: clickhouse-keeper
values.yaml_body_parsed:

kind: EC2NodeClass
metadata:

  instanceProfile: KarpenterNodeInstanceProfileV2-stage-nuon
  securityGroupSelectorTerms:
  - tags:
      karpenter.sh/discovery: stage-nuon
  subnetSelectorTerms:
  - tags:
      karpenter.sh/discovery: stage-nuon
  tags:

values.name: ctl-api-api
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: karpenter.k8s.aws/v1
kind: EC2NodeClass
metadata:
  name: ctl-api-api
spec:
  amiSelectorTerms:
  - alias: al2@latest
  instanceProfile: KarpenterNodeInstanceProfileV2-stage-nuon
  securityGroupSelectorTerms:
  - tags:
      karpenter.sh/discovery: stage-nuon

values.name: default
values.yaml_body_parsed:
apiVersion: karpenter.sh/v1
kind: NodePool
metadata:
  name: default
spec:
  disruption:
    budgets:
    - nodes: "1"
    - duration: 11h
      nodes: "1"
      schedule: 0 10 * * 1,2,3,4,5
    consolidateAfter: 1m
    consolidationPolicy: WhenEmptyOrUnderutilized
  limits:
    cpu: 1000
    memory: 1000Gi
  template:
    spec:
      expireAfter: 24h
      nodeClassRef:
        group: karpenter.k8s.aws
        kind: EC2NodeClass
        name: default
      requirements:
      - key: karpenter.sh/capacity-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - on-demand
      - key: node.kubernetes.io/instance-type
        operator: In
        values:
        - t3a.medium
        - t3a.large
      - key: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
        operator: In
        values:
        - us-west-2a
        - us-west-2b
        - us-west-2c
